data.title: Student Hall Recommended by Aoyama Gakuin University Information
data.meta_description: Student Hall Recommended by Aoyama Gakuin University Information
data.text:
Monthly Expenses / Student Hall Entry Expenses

Rent (with meal)

84,900 jpy

Other

Monthly Management Fee★: 6,000 jpy

Electricity Bill★: 11,000 jpy

Water Bill★: 1,650 jpy

Internet Bill★: 3,960 jpy

Entrance Procedure Fee

Addmission Fee: 100,000 jpy

Deposit: 50,000 jpy

*Building Maintenance Fee of 3,000 JPY and a Room Cleaning Fee of ★47,300 JPY will be charged at the time of the contract

*The fees listed above are for exchange students.

*It is also possible to have a contract without a meal plan (the rent is 5,000 yen less than the above amount).

*The items marked with "★" are taxable, and the price is tax included. *The prices shown above are as of July 2023.
